paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the best rank-1 approximation to higher-order symmetric tensors in the least-squares sense, and show that the best rank-1 approximation of a symmetric tensor with even order m can be determined by m/2 unit spheres and a best symmetric rank-1 approximation of a symmetric tensor with order 4 and dimension 2 is also its best rank-1 approximation. paper_title: On the best rank-1 approximation to higher-order symmetric tensors
